title: Understanding Open Source Project Sponsorship Models
description: Explore various sponsorship models for open source projects, including donation platforms, crowdfunding, corporate sponsorship, and dual licensing. Learn why sponsorship is vital for project sustainability and how both sponsors and maintainers can benefit from these collaborations.
keywords: open source, sponsorship models, donation platforms, crowdfunding, corporate sponsorship, dual licensing, GitHub Sponsors, Open Collective, Patreon, Kickstarter, Indiegogo, Linux Foundation, Apache Software Foundation, MongoDB, Qt
